name: Greedy
description:
Short prototype of videogame made for the Pizza Jam 4 about the Gluttony sin.

Made by:

  • Ana Cartamil Bueno
  • María Moreno Cobos

In future updates after the Jam, we'd like to include a main menu with a normal and a frustrating level (the current one is the frustrating level), and also a keys system to reset the level.
